title: Define error entry schema and create common-errors.json
description: Create common-errors.json with seed data containing error entry schema (id, category, severity, context, error details, analysis, resolution, prevention with keywords) and populate with 2+ example errors from Power Query and DAX domains.
notes: Created common-errors.json with comprehensive error entry schema and 6 seed errors: ERR-PQ-001 (Bronze type conversion), ERR-PQ-002 (Silver direct source), ERR-DAX-001 (no VAR pattern), ERR-DAX-002 (measure in row context), ERR-GEN-001 (Edit without Read), ERR-PY-001 (missing encoding). Each entry includes context, symptoms, analysis, resolution, prevention with keywords, and examples.
